settings.heading: Effortless Glam for the coolest girls
settings.description: Switch up your style in seconds, powered by ReXI™ lab-made hair

settings.text: Instant glam. Effortless beauty. Every day. Our wigs are crafted with innovative fibres that mimic real hair, hold styles longer, and made to truly wear-and-go!"

settings.caption: ReXI™ lab-made Technology
settings.text: Our innovative ReXI™ Hair combines the best fibers with our protein infusion system to deliver real hair sheen and performance

settings.caption: Custom Base Materials
settings.text: We take all the feedback on comfort to our product rooms where we design custom caps, lace attachments and all base materials to help you truly wear and go

settings.caption: Factory to Finish Ethical Production
settings.text: All textures and wigs are made ethically in our factory by our techs and artisans who craft and shape what will soon become your favourite styles

settings.heading: Join the Glam club
settings.text: Sign up for our rewards program and start earning points on every purchase. Enjoy exclusive perks and discounts when you join the #Glamclub

settings.heading: Find the look for you
settings.text: Are you a Bob girl, Glam Girl or Pony Girl? Tell us your vibe and we’ll find your match #GlamQuiz
